1.title: Information Technology Management
1.description: Studied IT fundamentals, including architecture, operating systems, and programming logic. Learned about system development with a focus on programming, databases, and web technologies. Also studied network administration, cloud computing, and servers. In addition, I explored agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban, as well as IT service management practices with ITIL.
